page.title: 02Economics
page.content: In the{Scalby/Newby}area there are 2 banks and 3 building societies. { Barclays is only a daughter branch and does not provide a full range of services. It was established in 1965 and has 3 employees. The National Westminster Bank was established in 1971 and employs 5 people. The Scarborough Building Society, founded in 1846, has its headquarters at {Scalby,}where 60 people are employed. The Society has 20 branches, 7 of them in{Scarborough.} The Halifax branch is run by solicitors and was established in 1979-80 employing 6 people. The Abbey National office, established in 1976-7, employs 2 people. It also caters for people from Whitby seeking withdrawals from accounts.
